creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
text:
when submiting or publishing a allready submitet, published document you get
redirected to the loginscreen. 
IMO it should give you a meaningful error even if the UI doesn't allow to submit
an allready submited document.

creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
The problem is certainly that the menu item is not disabled and the
WorkflowAuthorizer complains that the event may not be invoked.
